info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH INTENSE LIGHTNING WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN OCONEE COUNTY UNTIL 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with intense lightning 10 miles southwest of Walhalla, or 4 miles west of Westminster, moving east at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Westminster and Oakway. In addition to intense lightning, very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. If outdoors, try to get indoors or into a hard topped vehicle. Otherwise, stay away from open areas and isolated high objects such as trees. When indoors, stay away from windows and doors and avoid using wired electronic devices. Do not take a shower or bath. Try to unplug unnecessary appliances before the storm approaches.
